[bq="trashboat"]I really want Saitama in that MUGEN fighting game thing. (Give him a super elaborate moveset, Maybe with Street fighter 3/Garou level animation, But even the most basic blows deplete the entire healthbar. And when he wins he just sighs and walks off the screen.)[/bq]
I don't know.
Seeing how ultra powerful OP characters, or "cheap chars", are very hated in the MUGEN community, I feel that would be a bad idea.
